uvicorn
aiohttp
loguru
requests
requests-unixsocket
typing_extensions
webdavclient3
certifi
# NOTE: libnfs pip package removed - gmi_ieops uses ctypes to call libnfs C library directly
# The pip "libnfs" package is incompatible with libnfs 6.x C library which we need for custom port support
# NOTE: NFS support has been DISABLED. Use WebDAV backend instead.
click>=7.0,!=8.3.*
